features: Advanced Manual-focus 1080P Web Camera: Manual-focus camera with fast focusing speed and stable image quality. Make sure you're always in focus - even in low-light, high-contrast environments.

110 Degrees Wide-Angle view: Webcam 1080p captures video at a wide angle of up to 110 degrees, pro stream camera with advanced H.264 video compression technology provides you the excellent quality video on most software

Built-in Omnidirectional Stereo Microphone: The upgraded microphone and audio processing chip will detect noise and subtract it from the output, while also expanding the sound recognition range to improve call quality.

USB webcam with Wide Compatibility: Compatible with Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 or higher. The compatibility of the streaming camera is super wide for major software like Zoom, Tik Tok, Skype, YouTube, and more. Easy installation, driver-free installation.
body.description: Feature:1080P FHD DefinationWith three-layer lens combination, this webcam is able to captures video and images at a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, deliver a more immersive and professional visual experience, allowing users to communicate effectively and present themselves with greater clarity during video calls and recordings.110° Wide Viewing AngleThe webcam comes with 110° wide viewing angle, easily capture and share your more creative space with audience.Built-in Audio Pickup-High Efficiency Noise - Cancelling MicrophoneThe webcam built-in audio pickup, easy to capture clear and natural stereo audio, no need for external pickup equipment. Designed to filter out background noise and focus on capturing the speaker’s voice more clearly, the web camera with microphone helps improve audio quality and enhances communication during online interactions.Compatible with Popular Live Streaming SoftwareThe webcam is compatible with your favorite streaming software like OBS, effortlessly streams to Instagram, Tiktok, Facebook and other platform. It also works as Well of Video Conferencing.Wide CompatibilityCompatible with Windows 7/10/11, MacOS10.10 or higher, Linux, Android TV 7.0 or higher. Super wide compability for major software like Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, Skype and more. Whether it's for online learning, home office meeting, or video calling, the webcam gets whatever you need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug & Play This USB webcam can be easily set up with USB connector, you can plug and play. This PC external webcam can be compatible with the current popular video/meeting softwares. Provide excellent quality video streaming on social gaming and social media such as Facebook, Twitch , Skype ,You Tube. Being a universal used video chatting equipment, you can use this computer camera on major popular video software like Facebook, YouTube, Skype, Zoom, Face Time and others. For the operating devices, this webcam supports Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/ Windows 10, Mac OS, Android Smart TV and other major systems.

4-Layer Glass Coated Lenses Omnidirectional sound absorption and noise reduction microphone, pick up your voice and filter out background noise automatically, enabling you to enjoy clearer voice for hassle-free communication. Designed with a high-level lens, this webcam gives an excellent image quality at a HD 1080P resolution. It can reach up to 30 fps which makes that so easy to see every detail clearly and smoothly. If the lens is out of focus during shipping, you could manually rotate the lens to adjust the clarity.

Manual Focus Lens After the sharpness is adjusted to the best.it is stable and does not need to be adjusted frequently. With the 90° and 180° rotatable clip, you can easily adjust the angel of the webcam's clip and the lens to fit your computer well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera so clear!!! I have a webcam that cost triple the amount and this one is wayyyy better! So clear!!
